Key Match Events: Dereck Lively II was a late scratch due to a right shoulder sprain
Pre-Game Insights: Dereck Lively II was injured during a pre-game shoot-around
His absence was due to a right shoulder sprain
The Mavericks' frontcourt will be tested against the Pacers' frontcourt
Lively has been averaging 9.3 points, 8.2 rebounds, and 2.5 assists this season
Lively has been working on his three-point shooting but hasn't attempted one yet this season
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lively's focus on natural three-point shooting
His goal is to make efficient plays and not force three-pointers
His presence would draw defenses away from the paint, creating space for teammates
